General.Name: Sichuan Qiaoyuan Gas Co.Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Qiaoyuan Gas Co.,Ltd produces high-purity liquid gas in China. It provides liquid oxygen, liquid nitrogen, liquid argon, medical oxygen, and various bottled gases. The company's products are used in metallurgy, chemical, pharmaceutical, electronics, and other industries. Sichuan Qiaoyuan Gas Co.,Ltd was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
